title: Logan Square 1 bedroom Spacious
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   One bedroom apartment with lots of vintage charm in Logan Square with Hardwood Floors. The apartment is a 5 minute walk to the Logan Square Blue Line stop and the Farmer's Market. Dine-in kitchen with pantry and bedroom that easily fits a queen bed. Quiet side-street (on St. Louis at Wrightwood) with plenty of permit-free street parking.   - HEAT INCLUDED.  - On-site Laundry.  - Wi-Fi included - Ample closet space - Close to great restaurants, grocery  shopping and transportation.  - Pet friendly  - Rent $1295 per month.  If interested best contact to call Bill at 312-719-3621
